title: A. Ehab and another construction problem
statement:
Given an integer $$$x$$$, find 2 integers $$$a$$$ and $$$b$$$ such that:

  • $$$1 \le a,b \le x$$$
  • $$$b$$$ divides $$$a$$$ ($$$a$$$ is divisible by $$$b$$$).
  • $$$a \cdot b>x$$$.
  • $$$\frac{a}{b}<x$$$.
inputSpecification: The only line contains the integer $$$x$$$ $$$(1 \le x \le 100)$$$.
outputSpecification: You should output two integers $$$a$$$ and $$$b$$$, satisfying the given conditions, separated by a space. If no pair of integers satisfy the conditions above, print "-1" (without quotes).
name: Ehab and another construction problem
